title: Alert lib for Pebble: Very Small Library for a Simple Alert

components.text: In making improvements to Wristponder, I developed a mechanism that I've gone on to make into a small library that I'll doubtless reuse again in the future, as can you!
!To use, simply copy the files into your /src folder, #include "alert.h" and call alert_show(...). You can also update an existing alert and cancel at any time.
The full details as well as an example project are on the GitHub page here. Enjoy!
